questions.question: 1 3 − x = 81 \frac{1}{3^{-x}}=81 3 − x 1 ​ = 81 হলে x এর মান কত?
questions.explanation: এখানে, 1 3 − x = 81 ⇒ 3 x = 81 ⇒ 3 x = 3 4 ⇒ x = 9 \begin{aligned} & \frac{1}{3^{-x}}=81 \\ \Rightarrow & 3^{x}=81 \\ \Rightarrow & 3^{x}=3^{4} \\ \Rightarrow & x=9\end{aligned} ⇒ ⇒ ⇒ ​ 3 − x 1 ​ = 81 3 x = 81 3 x = 3 4 x = 9 ​
